content.question: The International Space Station ( <math alttext="I S S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ISS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> ) is orbiting Earth at an altitude of approximately <math alttext="400 kilometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>400</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> . The mass of the <math alttext="I S S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ISS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is approximately <math alttext="4.0 times 10 to the power 5 kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> . The radius and mass of Earth are approximately <math alttext="6.4 times 10 to the power 6 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace></mrow></msup><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="6.00 times 10 to the power 24 kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6.00</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>24</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> , respectively. What is the approximate speed of the <math alttext="I S S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ISS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> as it orbits Earth?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.99 times 10 to the power negative 6 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.99</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2.04 times 10 to the power negative 6 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.04</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="7.67 times 10 cubed meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.67</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="7.91 times 10 cubed meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.91</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="5.98 times 10 to the power 7 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.89</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="7.67 times 10 cubed meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.67</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
